{"step_by_step_thinking": "A dental surveyor is used to analyze the relative parallelism of two or more surfaces of the teeth or other parts of the dental cast. It helps in determining the best path of insertion and removal for removable partial dentures. It is also used to mark the survey line on a cast or a crown on a cast. Therefore, it is used to locate undercuts to be used for retention or to be blocked out.", "answer_choice": "D"}
